sn3.17:1.3: Seated to one side, King Pasenadi said to the Buddha,
sn3.17:1.4: “Sir, is there one thing that secures benefits for both
sn3.17:1.5: the present life and lives to come?”
sn3.17:4.1: “Diligence, great king, is one thing that secures benefits for both
sn3.17:4.2: the present life and lives to come.
sn3.17:4.3: The footprints of all creatures that walk can fit inside an elephant’s footprint. So an elephant’s footprint is said to be the biggest of them all.
sn3.17:4.4: In the same way, diligence is one thing that secures benefits for both
sn3.17:4.5: the present life and lives to come.”
sn3.17:4.6: That is what the Buddha said. …

sn3.17:5.4: heaven, and birth in an eminent family—
